segments.text: I see the woman in the kitchen, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so focused as she polishes that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water pouring over the sink, but she seems utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading beneath her feet, but she isn't aware of the chaos building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to shout, 'Look out!' but I know she can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window creates such a beautiful contrast with the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost poetic how the outside garden looks so pristine compared to the turmoil here.
segments.speaker: PAR
